articles.author: The West Australian
articles.title: Cristiano Ronaldo snub costs Coca-Cola $5 billion stock hit after Euro 2020 conference stunt - The West Australian
articles.description: In a matter of seconds overnight Cristiano Ronaldo managed to wipe more than AU$5 billion off the market value of Coca-Cola in Europe.
articles.content:
Hes one of the greatest soccer players of all time, with nearly 300 million fans on Instagram alone, so when Cristiano Ronaldo snubs your product, you know youve got a problem.

articles.title: France beat Germany as Ronaldo makes history - SuperSport
articles.description: World champions France beat Germany in a blockbuster Euro 2020 clash on Tuesday, after Cristiano Ronaldo became the all-time top European Championship goal-scorer.
